meanings.definition: A person or thing that converts something.
meanings.sent1: The convertors in the factory work hard to change raw materials into finished products.
meanings.sent2: The convertors in the kitchen transform ingredients into delicious meals.
meanings.sent3: The little robot wanted to be a convertors and turn old toys into new ones.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like magic convertors, changing sadness into joy.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's power was to act as a convertors, turning evil into good.

meanings.definition: A device that converts one form of energy into another.
meanings.sent1: Solar panels are efficient convertors of sunlight into electricity.
meanings.sent2: The wind turbine is a powerful convertors of wind energy into electricity.
meanings.sent3: The energy convertors at the power plant had a dance party when they were working well.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a solar convertors, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The river was a natural convertors, turning the force of water into energy.

meanings.definition: A program that changes the format of a file.
meanings.sent1: I used a convertors to change the document from PDF to Word.
meanings.sent2: The image convertors helped me resize the picture for the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The file convertors decided to play a prank and turned all the text into emojis.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a file convertors, organizing thoughts into clear ideas.
meanings.sent5: The software acted as a convertors, transforming data into meaningful insights.
